title: H. Hani' ibn `Urwah (as)
text: DESC: When you stop at the tomb of Hani' ibn `Urwah, you may greet the Holy Prophet (s) and then say the following:
فَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ مَنْ قَتَلَكَ وَٱسْتَحَلَّ دَمَكَ
اشْهَدُ انَّكَ لَقِيتَ ٱللَّهَ وَهُوَ رَاضٍ عَنْكَ
وَاشْهَدُ انَّكَ قَدْ بَلَغْتَ دَرَجَةَ ٱلشُّهَدَاءِ
وَبَذَلْتَ نَفْسَكَ فِي ذَاتِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَرْضَاتِهِ
وَجَمَعَنَا وَإِيَّاكُمْ مَعَهُمْ فِي دَارِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
DESC: You may then offer a two-unit prayer and present it as a gift to Hani' ibn `Urwah. Then, you may pray Almighty Allah to grant you your requests.
DESC: As for bidding farewell to him, you may say the same form of wada` (bidding farewell) that is said to Muslim ibn `Aqil.
